about_the_game:
With this soundtrack you will get every track from Rift's Vertex, the beginning of Zeke's journey, to the depths of the Demonic Realms and beyond!
The genres of this soundtrack vary from calming walking tracks to intense battle music that changes in every continent and land across Riftania!
detailed_description:
With this soundtrack you will get every track from Rift's Vertex, the beginning of Zeke's journey, to the depths of the Demonic Realms and beyond!
The genres of this soundtrack vary from calming walking tracks to intense battle music that changes in every continent and land across Riftania!

name: Riftania Soundtrack
short_description: This soundtrack portrays the areas of Riftania as you make your way thru the different lands and thru many different battles along the way!
